net.suberic.crypto.bouncycastle
Class BouncySMIMEEncryptionKey

java.lang.Object
  net.suberic.crypto.bouncycastle.BouncySMIMEEncryptionKey
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, java.security.Key, EncryptionKey
public class BouncySMIMEEncryptionKey
extends java.lang.Object
implements EncryptionKey

A wrapper around a Certificate and/or Key used to encrypt, decrypt, sign, etc. an email message in S/MIME.

See Also:
